verbose_text: In addition to effective scavenging of salt stress derived ROS, halophytes display a whole range of various mechanisms, including the development of special tubers at leaves or stems that may contain large amounts of salt, the production of enzymes that limit ion transfer through membranes, the generation of stress proteins and osmolytes and active metal detoxification in vacuoles, which enable homeostasis maintenance under stressful conditions [XREF_BIBR].
